task.title: Set Line Spacing
task.shortdesc: You can easily adjust the line spacing on your typewriter by activating your line spacing lever.

step.note: Next to the line spacing lever, you will notice some numbering. The number "1" corresponds to single spacing, "2" corresponds to double spacing, and "3" corresponds to triple spacing.
step.cmd: Shift the lever to the spacing you prefer

substep.cmd: Type a few words and hit the carriage return lever to check if your line spacing is set as desired.
